markdownRemark.html:
I'm amazed with how quickly time seems to be flying by these days. While life with COVID-19 is really quite challenging, I'm doing my best to stay active and keep an optimistic outlook.

I'm exercising somewhat regularly, and I've taken an interest in cryptocurrencies and am very fascinated with NFTs! I created a couple myself, containing artwork I created long ago:

My Blue Rabbit

and

Clown Face

This has gotten me interested in making artwork again so I've created a couple pieces recently - so refreshing!
